member.name: IWICMetadataWriterInfo.CreateInstance
member.param: Pointer that receives a pointer to a metadata writer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataWriterInfo.GetHeader
member.summary: Gets the metadata header for the metadata writer.
member.param: The format container GUID to obtain the header for.
The size of the pHeader buffer.
The actual size of the header.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataWriterInfo
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide basic information about the registered metadata writer.
